summary: Two young English women go on a cycling tour of the French countryside. When one of them goes missing, the other begins to search for her. But who can she trust?
cast: Pamela Franklin|Michele Dotrice|Sandor Elès|John Nettleton|Clare Kelly|Hana Maria Pravda|John Franklyn|Claude Bertrand|Jean Carmet|André Maranne
title: De repente, la oscuridad
